Texts.Chs: 把^orange;臂炮^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;arm cannon^reset; to the ^green;annoying guy^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 高兴：谢谢你的帮助。承诺：像素！如果你不介意的话，请放开我的手。
Texts.Eng: Delighted: Thank you for you aid. As promised: the cash ! Take this off my hands too, if you don't mind.

Texts.Chs: 困扰：我需要援助。我承认我是一个厉害的工程师，但是我却不能在^orange;军械制作台^reset;制造一个^green;臂炮^reset;。你能帮助我吗？我很富有，可以付你钱！
Texts.Eng: Troubled: I am in need of aid. I must admit I am a terrible engineer and cannot craft an ^green;arm cannon^reset; at the ^orange;armory^reset;. Might you assist? I am wealthy and can pay you!
